#### Size of the subdirectories within a directory
`du -h --max-depth=1`
#### `.tar` files
- How to compress into a `.tar` file
`tar -cvf Sample_BenEvansBJE3652_180bp_Library.tar Sample_BenEvansBJE3652_180bp_Library`

`tar -tf BJE3652_6KB_Data_first_lane.tar`
